mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(R.GRADE) AS COUNT FROM REVIEW R, FOODTRUCK F WHERE F.FTRUCK_NO = R.FTRUCK_NO AND F.FTRUCK_NO = #{ftruckNo}
SELECT SUM(R.GRADE) AS TOTAL FROM REVIEW R, FOODTRUCK F WHERE F.FTRUCK_NO = R.FTRUCK_NO AND F.FTRUCK_NO = #{ftruckNo}

SELECT FFFT.* FROM (SELECT FFT.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, FT.* FROM (SELECT F.*, L.APP_STAT, NVL2(F.FTRUCK_GRADE, 0, 10) AS COUNT FROM FOODTRUCK F, LICENSE L WHERE F.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO AND L.APP_STAT = 'Y' AND F.FTRUCK_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY L.APP_STAT DESC,F.FTRUCK_REG )FT )FFT WHERE ROWNUM <=#{pageNo}+9 )FFFT WHERE RNUM>=#{pageNo}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT F.* FROM FOODTRUCK F, LICENSE L WHERE F.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO AND F.FTRUCK_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY L.APP_STAT DESC, FTRUCK_GRADE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM (SELECT F.* FROM FOODTRUCK F, LICENSE L WHERE F.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO ORDER BY L.APP_STAT DESC, FTRUCK_REG ) WHERE rownum<=10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOODTRUCK F,LICENSE L WHERE F.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO AND L.APP_STAT = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOODTRUCK WHERE FTRUCK_STATE ='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOODTRUCK WHERE FTRUCK_STATE ='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOODTRUCK F, LICENSE L WHERE F.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO AND L.APP_STAT = 'Y' AND CATEGORY=#{category}
SELECT COUNT(F.FTRUCK_NO) AS COUNT, F.FTRUCK_NO FROM FOODTRUCK F, REVIEW R WHERE R.FTRUCK_NO = F.FTRUCK_NO GROUP BY F.FTRUCK_NO
